issue.title: [C++][R] Should be able to join on keys that are string to large_string type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15034](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15034). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Got a report that if your join key is string on one side and large_string on the other, the join doesn't work. It seems reasonable that this should work.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15034?focusedCommentId=17456000) by Jeanette Clark (jclark):*
I ran into this today - trying to join two arrow datasets together in R using left_join.

Error: Invalid: Incompatible data types for corresponding join field keys: FieldRef.Name(SampleID) of type large_string and FieldRef.Name(SampleID) of type string
